2348450790: E ʻoluʻolu e heluhelu i kēia mau ʻŌlelo o ka lawelawe. Hoʻopili lākou, ma waena o nā mea ʻē aʻe, nā hōʻole o nā palapala hōʻoia, nā palena o ke kuleana, a me ka hoʻopaʻa ʻana i ka hoʻopaʻa ʻana. E ʻoluʻolu e hoʻomaopopo ua loli paha kēia mau Kūlana o ka lawelawe mai kāu kipa hope ʻana i kā mākou pūnaewele. Hiki iā mākou ke hoʻoponopono a hoʻololi i kēia mau Kūlana o ka lawelawe i kēlā me kēia manawa ma ko mākou manaʻo ponoʻī. Inā loaʻa kahi hoʻololi waiwai, e haʻi aku mākou iā ʻoe ma ka hoʻouna ʻana i nā Kūlana o ka lawelawe hou ʻana ma kēia ʻaoʻao, a ma hope o ia mea pono ʻoe e ʻae ʻae i nā Kūlana o ka lawelawe hou i mea e hoʻomau ai i ka hoʻohana ʻana a i ʻole ke komo ʻana i ka Pūnaewele a i ʻole ka Service.
1064537632: E ʻoluʻolu, e hoʻomalu ʻia kāu hoʻohana ʻana i kā mākou lawelawe e kā mākou Data Processing Agreement, i hoʻohui ʻia ma ʻaneʻi e ka kuhikuhi. E ʻoluʻolu e nānā i kēia ʻaelike e ʻike i ke ʻano o kā mākou hana ʻana i ka ʻikepili pilikino no ʻoe. E hoʻomaopopo he hana mākou ma ke ʻano he "mea hana ʻikepili" no nā kumu o ka EU General Data Protection Regulation, a he "lawelawe lawelawe" no ke kumu o ka California Consumer Privacy Act.

1807143500: Aia nā lawelawe i kahi lawelawe palekana pūnaewele (ʻo ka "hCaptcha Service") a me kahi kahua (ka "Intuition Machines Platform") kahi e hiki ai i kahi kanaka ("Contributor") ke koho e hana i nā hana a kahi hui ʻekolu a i ʻole Intuition Machines ponoʻī (kēlā me kēia. he "Noi") i kā mākou pūnaewele a i ʻole ka lawelawe hCaptcha, pololei ma kā mākou pūnaewele a i ʻole ma ke komo ʻana i ka Intuition Machines Platform a / a i ʻole ka hana ʻana i nā hana ma o a i ʻole e pili ana i kahi hui ʻaoʻao ʻekolu a / a i ʻole platform a lawelawe paha (kēlā me kēia, he "Integrator"). Hoʻouna ka poʻe noi i nā hana a kono i nā mea kōkua e hoʻokō i nā uku i hāʻawi ʻia e IMI i Integrators, a i ʻole e like me ka mea i hoʻoholo ʻia e ka mea noi inā hoʻohana ka mea noi i ka Intuition Machines Platform a i ʻole ka lawelawe hCaptcha e lawelawe i nā hana i kā lākou mea hoʻohana hope. Ke koi nei mākou i nā hui a me nā kānaka (ʻo kēlā me kēia "mea kūʻai aku") no ka hoʻohana ʻana i kā mākou kahua i hiki iā lākou ke hoʻohana i kā mākou polokalamu, nā hana mea kākau, hoʻolimalima iā mākou i nā hana mea kākau, a/a i ʻole e loaʻa i nā mea kōkua. Hoʻouna pū mākou i nā Integrators no ka hoʻohana ʻana i kā mākou lawelawe hCaptcha i mea e hōʻemi ai i ka hoʻopunipuni, ka hoʻomāinoino, a me ka spam ma kā lākou pūnaewele, nā polokalamu kelepona, a me nā waiwai pūnaewele ʻē aʻe. ʻO ka mea i ʻōlelo ʻia ma luna nei i kapa ʻia ʻo "Nā lawelawe."

Me nā mea ʻē aʻe i kūʻē i kēia, hiki ke hoʻohana ʻia kēlā me kēia ʻikepili Aggregate/De-identified e IMI no kekahi kumu ʻoihana i ka wā a i ʻole ma hope o ka manawa o kēia ʻaelike, me ka palena ʻole o ka hoʻomohala ʻana a me ka hoʻomaikaʻi ʻana i nā lawelawe a me ka hana ʻana a kaʻana like i nā hōʻike a me nā mea ʻē aʻe. mea waiwai. No ka akaka, ʻaʻole hāʻawi kēia Pauku 5 iā mākou i ke kuleana e hoʻomaopopo iā ʻoe ʻo ke kumu o kekahi ʻikepili Aggregate/De-identified me ka ʻole o kāu ʻae kākau mua ʻana.

767207800: Inā loaʻa i kāu ʻikepili nā ʻike kikoʻī a hōʻino paha, koi mākou iā ʻoe e kaha iā lākou "EXPLICIT CONTENT" e lilo i ʻōlelo aʻo kūpono i ka poʻe e ʻike i kāu ʻikepili. ʻAʻole paha ʻoe me ka ʻole o ka ʻaelike kākau ʻokoʻa me IMI e hoʻokomo i nā hana e kūʻē i kā mākou mau kulekele, me, akā ʻaʻole i kaupalena ʻia, (a) nā hana e hoʻolaha pololei a ʻaʻole pololei paha i kahi pūnaewele ʻē aʻe a i ʻole lawelawe, (b) nā hana e uhaki i nā ʻōlelo a kahi pūnaewele ʻekolu. nā kūlana, (c) nā hana e noi ana i nā mea kōkua e noi i nā ʻaoʻao ʻekolu, (d) nā hana e noi ai i nā mea kōkua e hana i ka hana e hoʻopunipuni i ka ʻano a i ʻole nā hopena o kahi pūnaewele, (e) nā hana e uhaki i nā kuleana waiwai naʻauao o nā ʻaoʻao ʻekolu, a (f) nā hana. e koi i nā mea kōkua e hoʻoiho i nā polokalamu a i ʻole nā faila.

3733422465: 8. E hōʻoia ana i kou ʻike
267645277: Hiki i ka IMI ke hōʻoia i kou ʻike. Hiki paha i kēia ke hoʻohālikelike i kāu ʻike pilikino me nā ʻikepili ʻaoʻao ʻekolu a i ʻole nā palapala kānāwai kūhelu. ʻAe ʻoe iā mākou e hana i nā nīnau e pono ai e hōʻoia i kou ʻike, kou kuleana o kāu leka uila, a me kou kuleana o kāu mau moʻokāki kālā. Ua ʻae ʻoe e hāʻawi i ka ʻike e pili ana iā ʻoe e kōkua iā mākou i ka hōʻoia ʻana i kou ʻike.
519755936: ʻO ʻoe wale nō ke kuleana no ka mālama ʻana i nā kānāwai federal, mokuʻāina, panalāʻau, a kūloko e pili ana i kāu hoʻohana ʻana i nā lawelawe. Ua ʻae ʻoe e hoʻopaʻi a paʻa ʻole iā mākou no nā koi kūʻē iā mākou no ka mea ʻaʻole ʻoe i hoʻokō i kekahi kānāwai a i ʻole ʻoe i uhaki i nā kuleana o nā ʻaoʻao ʻekolu, me ka ʻole o ka palena o ka ʻaelike, ka waiwai naʻauao, a i ʻole nā kuleana pilikino.
731546974: 10. Nā ʻauhau a i ʻole nā mea hoʻohui
3128328457: Inā he Contributor a Integrator paha ʻoe, ʻo ʻoe wale nō ke kuleana no ka uku ʻana i nā ʻauhau kālā i manaʻo ʻia a i ʻole nā ʻauhau kālā federal, mokuʻāina, a kūloko paha, mālama ola, FICA, a me ka uku o nā limahana ma muli o ka hoʻohana ʻana i kā mākou pūnaewele, a me nā ʻauhau like ʻole a i ʻole nā uku ma nā ʻāina ʻaʻole US. Ua ʻae ʻoe e hoʻopaʻi a mālama ʻole iā mākou no nā loiloi kūʻē iā mākou no ka mea ʻaʻole ʻoe i hoʻokō i nā kānāwai ʻauhau.
2931396764: 11. Kue i keia mau Manawa o ka lawelawe
1240667045: Hiki iā mākou ke hoʻokuʻu, kaupalena, a hoʻopau paha i kou komo ʻana i nā lawelawe i kēlā me kēia manawa no kekahi kumu, me ka mea: (a) manaʻo mākou ua uhaki ʻoe i kēia mau Kūlana o ka lawelawe (me nā kulekele pili ʻē aʻe); (b) manaʻo mākou ua uhaki ʻoe i kā mākou kuleana a i ʻole nā kuleana o kekahi ʻaoʻao ʻekolu; (c) ʻaʻole hiki iā mākou ke hōʻoia a hōʻoia i ka ʻike āu i hāʻawi mai ai iā mākou; a i ʻole (d) ke manaʻoʻiʻo nei mākou hiki i kāu mau hana ke hana i nā kuleana no ʻoe, iā mākou, a i ʻole kekahi ʻaoʻao ʻekolu. No ka pale ʻana i ka kānalua, mālama mākou i ke kuleana e pale a hoʻopaneʻe paha i ka uku iā ʻoe inā manaʻo mākou e pili ana kekahi o nā mea i ʻōlelo ʻia i kēlā uku.
1601080128: Inā mākou e hoʻopanee a hoʻopau i kāu moʻokāki, ʻaʻole ʻoe e loaʻa hou i nā ʻāpana o ka pūnaewele, me ka ʻikepili, nā memo, nā faila, a me nā mea ʻē aʻe āu e mālama ai ma ka pūnaewele. ʻAʻole hiki iā ʻoe ke hoʻomau i ka hoʻohana ʻana i kā mākou pūnaewele ma lalo o kahi inoa moʻokāki hou a i ʻole. Hiki ke hoʻopiʻi ʻia ka hewa o kēia mau Kūlana o ka lawelawe a hiki i ka hopena o nā hoʻopaʻi a me nā hoʻopaʻi.
1160707899: 12. Ke kuleana a me ka pilina o ka mea kōkua me IMI a me nā mea noi ʻē aʻe
269838707: Inā he Contributor ʻoe, ʻo ʻoe a ʻo ʻoe wale nō e hoʻoholo i ka hana a me ka nui o nā hana e hoʻopau ai, a i ka manawa a me kahi āu e hoʻopau ai. Hiki iā ʻoe ke hoʻolilo i ka nui a i ʻole ka liʻiliʻi o ka manawa e hoʻopau ai i nā hana e like me kāu e koho ai. ʻAʻohe manawa ʻoe ma lalo o kekahi kuleana e hoʻopau i kahi hana.
1087195513: Inā he Contributor ʻoe i komo i nā lawelawe a/a hana paha i nā hana ma o a pili pū me kahi Integrator ma ka inoa o kahi mea noi ʻaʻole ʻo IMI, a laila ʻae ʻoe a ʻae ʻaʻole kuleana ʻo Intuition Machines a ʻaʻohe kuleana iā ʻoe me mahalo i nā uku a i ʻole nā uku ʻē aʻe no nā hana i hoʻopau ʻia. Ua ʻae a ʻae ʻoe i nā uku a i ʻole nā uku ʻē aʻe no nā hana i hoʻopau ʻia e hoʻoholo wale ʻia e like me kāu ʻaelike me ka mea noi a/a i ʻole ka Integrator, e like me ka pili. ʻO nā hoʻopaʻapaʻa e pili ana i ia mau uku a i ʻole nā uku ʻē aʻe (me ka ʻole o ka palena ʻole i ka loaʻa ʻole ʻana o ia mau makana a i ʻole nā uku ʻē aʻe) aia wale nō ma waena o ʻoe a me ka Mea Noi a/a i ka Mea Hoʻohui, e like me ka pili.
952813944: ʻAʻole kāu hoʻohana ʻana i kā mākou pūnaewele a i ʻole kekahi mea i loko o kēia ʻaelike e hoʻokumu i kahi hana, hui, hui hui, ʻoihana, franchise, a i ʻole ka pilina ʻelele kūʻai ma waena o ʻoe a me Intuition Machines. ʻAʻole mākou e hāʻawi iā ʻoe i nā mea hana a i ʻole nā mea hana e hoʻopau ai i kahi hana. ʻAʻole mākou e hāʻawi iā ʻoe i nā pōmaikaʻi, ka uku o nā limahana, a i ʻole ka ʻinikua. ʻAʻole mākou kuleana no nā lilo āu e hoʻohana ai i kā mākou pūnaewele. ʻAʻole mākou e ʻauʻa i kāu uku no ka ʻauhau kālā federal a mokuʻāina paha, Social Security, a i ʻole kekahi ʻauhau ʻē aʻe. Ua noa ʻoe i nā manawa a pau e hana i nā hana no kekahi kanaka a ʻoihana paha, me kekahi o kā mākou mea hoʻokūkū. ʻAʻohe ou mana e komo i kekahi ʻaelike, kākau a waha paha, ma ka inoa o Intuition Machines.
3460432665: ʻOiai ka mea i ʻōlelo ʻia ma mua, inā he ʻauhau ʻAmelika ʻoe, hiki iā mākou ke noi iā ʻoe i kahi W-9, e hoʻonui ʻia i kēlā me kēia makahiki, a hiki iā mākou ke pāpā iā ʻoe mai ka hana ʻana i nā hana a hiki i kou hoʻopau ʻana a i ʻole ka hoʻonui ʻana i kahi W-9.
458271951: Inā he Contributor ʻoe i komo i nā lawelawe a/a i ʻole hana i nā hana ma o a pili pū paha me kahi Integrator ma ka inoa o Intuition Machines (e hana ana ma ke ʻano he Noi), hiki i nā Intuition Machines ke uku iā ʻoe no ka hoʻokō ʻia ʻana o kekahi mau hana. 3056723024: 13. ʻAʻole ʻae ʻia ka hoʻopau ʻana i nā hana
3913203723: Inā, no kekahi kumu, ʻaʻole ʻae ka mea noi i ka hana ʻana i kahi hana āu i hoʻopau ai, ʻaʻole ʻoe e loaʻa i kahi uku no ka hana. Inā ua hoʻopuehu ʻia nā makana iā ʻoe no kahi hana i ʻae ʻole ʻia, hiki iā mākou ke hoʻihoʻi mai iā ʻoe.
3666807632: 14. Nā Kuleana a me nā mākau o ka mea kōkua
1993899769: 15. ʻO kā mākou hoʻohana ʻana i ka ʻike
2927283721: Ma ka hana ʻana i nā hana ma kā mākou pūnaewele, ʻae ʻoe i ka hōʻiliʻili, hoʻohana, a me ka hōʻike ʻana i kāu ʻike pilikino e like me kā mākou Kulekele pilikino. Eia kekahi, hiki iā mākou ke kaʻana like i kekahi ʻike e pili ana iā ʻoe a me kāu mau hana i hoʻopau ʻia i ka Mea Noi nona nā hana āu i hoʻopau ai e hoʻomaʻamaʻa i ka pilina lawelawe a hoʻomaikaʻi i ka pūnaewele, me ka laʻana, Contributor ID, nā hopena o nā hana i hoʻopau ʻia, a me nā ʻano ʻē aʻe e pili ana. kou mau ʻike, nā ʻōlelo, nā mākau, a me ka hoʻohana ʻana i ka pūnaewele.
3027055607: 16. Ka Waiwai Naauao a me na Kuleana Kuleana
3910971075: Na IMI nā kuleana a pau, me nā kuleana waiwai naʻauao, ma ke code kumu, code object a i ʻole ka hoʻokumu ʻana i lalo, manaʻo a algorithms, API, a me kekahi lako polokalamu hou, palapala a i ʻole ʻikepili e pili ana i nā lawelawe ("Software"). ʻAʻole ʻoe e, pololei a ʻole paha, ma o ka ʻaoʻao ʻekolu a i ʻole: (a) ʻenekinia hoʻohuli, hoʻokaʻawale, wehe, a i ʻole e hoʻāʻo e ʻike i ka Pūnaewele; (b) hoʻololi, unuhi, a i ʻole ka hana ʻana i nā hana i hoʻokumu ʻia e pili ana i kekahi Pūnaewele; (c) kope, hoʻolimalima, hoʻolimalima, hāʻawi, hoʻohiki, hāʻawi, a i ʻole e hoʻoili a hoʻopaʻa i nā kuleana i kekahi Pūnaewele; (d) hoʻohana i kekahi lako polokalamu no ka hoʻokaʻawale manawa, ke keʻena lawelawe lawelawe, a i ʻole no ka pono o kahi ʻaoʻao ʻekolu; a i ʻole (e) wehe i nā leka hoʻolaha a i ʻole nā lepili.
3660891610: Inā he Contributor ʻoe, IMI, ʻaʻole ʻoe, aia nā kuleana kuleana i kekahi hana āu e hana ai ma ke ʻano o ka hoʻopau ʻana i kekahi hana. Ma ka ʻae ʻana i nā ʻōlelo o kēia ʻaelike ua ʻae ʻoe i (a ma kēia ke hana nei) e hoʻoili i ka ʻona, ka ʻona, a me ke poʻo (me nā kuleana waiwai naʻauao a puni ka honua) a i kāu hana iā mākou. No ka hōʻoia i hiki iā mākou ke loaʻa, kūpono, a hoʻohana i ia mau kuleana, ʻae hou ʻoe e (i) kau inoa i nā palapala e kōkua i ka palapala, ka hemolele a me ka hoʻokō ʻana i kā mākou kuleana; a (ii) hāʻawi i ka ʻike kūpono i ka ʻike no ka hoʻopaʻa ʻana, hoʻomaʻemaʻe, hoʻopaʻa ʻana, pale ʻana, a hoʻokō ʻana i kēlā mau kuleana kuleana ma nā ʻāina āpau. E hoʻomau ʻia kāu mau kuleana ma lalo o kēia ʻāpana ma hope o kou hoʻopaʻa inoa ʻana a hoʻopau paha i ka hoʻohana ʻana i nā lawelawe. Koho ʻoe iā mākou i loio ʻoiaʻiʻo e hoʻokō i nā palapala no ʻoe no nā kumu i hōʻike ʻia ma kēia ʻāpana.
1408530660: Manaʻo ʻo IMI i ka waiwai naʻauao o nā poʻe ʻē aʻe a mālama mākou i ke kuleana e wehe i kā mākou pūnaewele i nā mea a mākou e manaʻoʻiʻo ai e hōʻino paha i nā kuleana noʻonoʻo o kekahi ʻaoʻao ʻekolu. Inā manaʻo ʻoe ua kope ʻia kāu hana ponoʻī ma ke ʻano he hewa kope kope ma kēia pūnaewele, e ʻoluʻolu e kelepona i ke kākoʻo mea kūʻai aku ʻo Intuition Machines.
3844300338: Ua ʻae ʻoe e hoʻopaʻi, pale, a mālama iā mākou mai nā koi a pau, nā poho, nā aie, nā koina, a me nā lilo (me nā uku loio kūpono a me nā koina), e kū mai ana a pili paha i kāu hana ʻana i nā hana a i kāu hoʻohana ʻana i kā mākou pūnaewele. .
2474091800: 19. Hoʻopaʻapaʻa me nā mea hoʻohana ʻē aʻe; Hoʻokuʻu
3162107126: ʻAʻole pili ʻo IMI i kekahi paio ma waena o ʻoe a me kekahi mea hoʻohana o nā lawelawe. Hoʻokuʻu ʻoe i ka IMI a me kāna mau hui mai nā koi, koi, a me nā pohō o kēlā me kēia ʻano a me ke ʻano, ʻike ʻia a ʻike ʻole ʻia, manaʻo ʻia a ʻike ʻole ʻia, hōʻike ʻia a ʻike ʻole ʻia, e kū mai ana a pili paha i kekahi paio ma waena o ʻoe a me kekahi mea hoʻohana.

2551802342: - Hoʻolālā mākou e hoʻihoʻi koke a hoʻomaka hou i nā hana ʻoihana ma hope o kahi haunaele ʻoihana koʻikoʻi a pane aku ma ka mālama ʻana i kā mākou limahana a me ka waiwai, hana i kahi loiloi kālā a me ka hana, pale i nā puke a me nā moʻolelo o ka ʻoihana, a me ka ʻae ʻana i kā mākou mea kūʻai aku a me kā lākou mea hoʻohana hope e hana ma ka pūnaewele. I ka pōkole, ua hoʻolālā ʻia kā mākou hoʻolālā hoʻomau ʻoihana e ʻae i kā mākou paʻa e hoʻomaka hou i nā hana i ka hiki ke hiki, ke hāʻawi ʻia i ke ākea a me ka paʻakikī o ka hoʻopilikia ʻoihana nui. ʻO kā mākou hoʻolālā hoʻomau ʻoihana ʻōlelo: hoʻihoʻi a hoʻihoʻi i ka ʻikepili; nā ʻōnaehana koʻikoʻi a pau; nā loiloi kālā a me ka hana; nā kamaʻilio ʻē aʻe me nā mea kūʻai aku, nā limahana, a me nā kino kiaʻi; wahi kino o na limahana; ka mea hoʻolako koʻikoʻi a me ka hopena o ka mea kūʻai; hōʻike hoʻoponopono; a hāʻawi koke i kā mākou mea kūʻai aku inā ʻaʻole hiki iā mākou ke hoʻomau i kā mākou ʻoihana. Kākoʻo kā mākou pūnāwai hoʻolako kumu i kā mākou mau moʻolelo koʻikoʻi ma kahi ʻāpana ʻāina. ʻOiai ʻo kēlā me kēia kūlana pilikia e kū nei i nā pilikia kūʻokoʻa e pili ana i nā kumu o waho, e like me ka manawa o ka lā a me ka paʻakikī o ka haunaele, ua ʻōlelo ʻia mākou e kēia pūnāwai mea hoʻolako i kā lākou pahuhopu e hoʻihoʻi i kā lākou mau hana ponoʻī a hiki ke hoʻomaka hou i nā lawelawe. ʻOiai ua hana mākou e hōʻemi i ka pilikia ma o ka hoʻohana ʻana i nā mea hoʻolako like ʻole, hiki ke hoʻololi a hoʻopau ʻia paha kāu mau lawelawe i kēia manawa.
